title: Dodo Bon Pan Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, International, Western, Buffet, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Cafe offering many vegetarian and vegan dishes like salads, sandwiches made with soy faux meat, scrambled tofu breakfast. Drinks include hot chocolate and coffee with almond milk, organic tea. Located next to the French Embassy in the old city, Casco Antiguo, which has been renovated and is visited by tourists every day. Has Wi-Fi. Houses a gallery on the second floor.
